roleset.name: escorting while in transit (watch out for non-events)

example.name: Not Eventive. .YY
example.text: US Troops lay out equipment as they prepare their convoy to depart from COS Kalsu .

example.name: Not Eventive. .YY.
example.text: That makes the decision to go with IEDs a no - brainer for the insurgents . In the standard ambush , the kind we were facing a year ago , the insurgents detonated an IED under a convoy , then opened up on the stalled survivors with RPG and small arms fire .

example.name: NOT EVENTIVE. .YY!
example.text: Convoys travel with jammers that make it harder to detonate the IED by cell phone or garage door opener

example.name: Eventive, with PRP
example.text: On Thursday , June 21 , NASCAR Nationwide Series team haulers will gather at Times Printing Company in Random Lake , Wisconsin prior to their convoy to Road America for the Sargento 200 Presented by Menards .

propbank.arg: for the Sargento 200 Presented by Menards

example.name: again
example.text: state troopers are packing gear today and will assemble this afternoon at the JFK Highway Barrack to begin their convoy to New Jersey

example.name: Light Verb
example.text: How many rubbish trucks will it take *PRO* to make a convoy to the moon

example.name: rare example, both args
example.text: 18 states of 50 are already organizing their Convoy to PorcFest 2011 - The Porcupine Freedom Festival !

roleset.note: CONVOY-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, WN eventive noun lexicon. No VNcls. (from convoy.01-n)
Most of these are not eventive. If you can replace 'convoy' with 'group', it's not an event. (from convoy.01-n)
